author: samisa
msg: Updating the version to 1.5.1 for next release based on Axis2 1.5.4

author: tross
msg: Two fixes in the Ruby QMF2 binding:
1) Fixed typos in the close methods for Console and Agent sessions
2) Fixed the makefile to properly distribute the qmf2.rb wrapper

author: rmuir
msg: add a hack (sorry) to print out if entire test classes are @Ignored

author: samisa
msg: Creating branch for 1.5.x. We will use this to do 1.5.1 release and future 1.5.x releases. We cannot use 1_5 branch for 1.5.1, because the trunk has moved a lot away from 1_5 branch. We cannot release 1.6 from trunk, as we have not yet released Axis2 1.6 and also we do not have many new features in here.
